I would give this game a 4/5 rating. They need to work on having a ranking system that more accurately represents the skill level of the players. They also need to crack down on cheaters. If there were less cheaters and people trolling this game would be a better competitive package. Facit etc seem to do match making better but with some of the same issues. Map selection has been pretty mediocre at times although it has gotten better lately. Bring back Austria, that map was awesome. 
Danger Zone is OK. It lacks something to push it over the top, to be a game mode I really want to play. Having multiple maps helps danger zone but I am not a fan of the re-spawning.
 I enjoy arms race and scouts knives from time to time. There are many community modes that can offer you something different from the official modes, whatever you are looking for.
